channel.title: Soulwarscape server and client project [317]
channel.description:
Whats up guys, so iv been working on my first server for a few days now and I'd thought id release what I currently have so far.. haha- its not much but its no where near done ;)
What I plan to complete in the next month:
[ol][li]Complete prestige system all new bosses with new textures all new weapons and server armor complete castle wars 100% working all new duel area with 100% working All specs for all weapons working adding poison to weapons (too easy) gettings skills max to 150 all skillcapes working maybe attempt a Grand Extange (custom location) all new shops around the world finish home and training area add dicing kill count system donator shops and fully working P2P Memership area's and items A huge interactive world with almost everything working with something.[/li] [li][/li][/ol]
[u][b]Wishing Well (Use coins on wells around the world)[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p1_zpsae112af6.png[/img]
[u][b]Cool new text font for client[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p5_zpsbf564c7c.png[/img]
[u][b]More Advanced shops will be around the world[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p6_zpsa3bb7612.png[/img]
[u][b]Functional prestige system (chest and key)[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p2_zps5031afaa.png[/img]
[u][b]Fully working dummies and cool new spec (a magic spec)[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p3_zpsace40574.png[/img]
[u][b]Cool new home area[/b][/u] [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/p4_zps4be0e6ed.png[/img]
[u][b]Cool cheap knockoff of Mac Login Box[/b][/u] [img]http://s1295.photobucket.com/user/im4ever12c/media/p7_zps11446ce5.png.html[/img]
That is what I have so far put into the server. If you have any suggestions, put them in and I will try to add them :). I will keep this updated on what I add maybe every week (hopefully) .

item.title: Soulwarscape server and client project [317]
item.dc:creator: @FromAutumnToAshes FromAutumnToAshes
item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Whats up guys, so iv been working on my first server for a few days now and I’d thought id release what I currently have so far… haha- its not much but its no where near done

What I plan to complete in the next month:

[ol][li]Complete prestige system
all new bosses with new textures
all new weapons and server armor
complete castle wars 100% working
all new duel area with 100% working
All specs for all weapons working
adding poison to weapons (too easy)
gettings skills max to 150
all skillcapes working
maybe attempt a Grand Extange (custom location)
all new shops around the world
finish home and training area
add dicing
kill count system
donator shops and fully working P2P Memership area’s and items
A huge interactive world with almost everything working with something.[/li]
[li][/li][/ol]

Wishing Well (Use coins on wells around the world)

Cool new text font for client

More Advanced shops will be around the world

Functional prestige system (chest and key)

Fully working dummies and cool new spec (a magic spec)

Cool new home area

Cool cheap knockoff of Mac Login Box

That is what I have so far put into the server. If you have any suggestions, put them in and I will try to add them :). I will keep this updated on what I add maybe every week (hopefully) .
